pages.text: The $(mob)Cyclops$() is a monster found in $(thing)Cyclops Coves$(). It herds $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheeps$() and attacks any player or monster that approaches its home. It can stomp intruders, or pick them up and bite them for heavy damage.$(p)Wearing a full set of $(item)Sheep Disguise Armor$() can trick it into not attacking on sight, and it can be blinded by shooting its eye with $(item)Arrows$() enough times.
